original_text: And the Lord turned a mighty strong west wind, which took away the locusts, and cast them into the Red sea; there remained not one locust in all the coasts of Egypt.
korean_text: 여호와께서 돌이켜 강렬한 서풍을 불게 하사 메뚜기를 홍해에 몰아넣으시니 애굽 온 땅에 메뚜기가 하나도 남지 아니하니라

sentences.original_text: And the Lord turned a mighty strong west wind
and cast them into the Red sea

sentences.korean_translation: 단 한 마리의 메뚜기도 남지 않았고

sentences.original_text: in all the coasts of Egypt
